body:
Comment 1: 
I'm guessing that $GOROOT/bin isn't in your PATH, which should be permissible at this
point in the build (we haven't told you to set your PATH yet).

Does it work if you put $GOROOT/bin at the front of your PATH, ie:

PATH=`pwd`/../bin ./all.bash
_Labels changed: added **priority-go1**, removed **priority-triage**._ _Owner changed to @adg._ _Status changed to **WaitingForReply**._
